nodes.text: The Mashi Horansi, nicknamed the "Night Stalkers", were a subspecies of the Horansi native to Mutanda.
Mashi stood on average between 1.5 and 2 meters tall. Their fur was jet black and the pelt of a Mashi Horansi was prized by other races. They were a very elusive race and were purely nocturnal.
They mated for life and the male raised the young. While able to use technology, they were uncomfortable with it. However, some Mashi moved to Justa and adapted well to using it.
